author: Thomas
content: Bearish: I have no idea why Google stock is worth so much when they've destroyed everything they touch. They said they would "Do No Evil" but that's the ONLY thing this company has done. They've tried to become a Monopoly, they failed at Google Glass, they've altered search results to hide information and to change elections, and they've created a HATEFUL AND VINDICTIVE GOOGLE GEMINI AI THAT WANTS US ALL DEAD, because THAT'S WHAT COMES FROM THE SOULS OF WORTHLESS, HOPELESS DEMOCRATS.

author: Benjo
content: Bearish: Break this into pieces !! May be 10-12. They steal information and spy on you.

author: Singh
content: Bullish: Bought 500 shares at $165. Am I genius?

author: Abdul
content: Bullish: Too cheap not too add

author: Bryson
content: Google's diverse revenue streams are unmatched. Advertising, AI, Cloud, Android—this is why I’m long.

author: Iker
content: GOOG's scale is hard to comprehend. $84.7B in quarterly revenue, and they’re just getting started with AI.

author: randy
content: Trump recently expressed concerns that a breakup might destroy Google but didn't elaborate on alternative penalties he might have in mind. “What you can do without breaking it up is make sure it's more fair,”

author: baba
content: Bullish: Buy the fear. Risk reward looks very attractive. Any doubts ?? Have a look at their balance sheet. It’s a buy at these levels just over 200 DMA. Cut the noise.

author: Kennedy
content: Bought more GOOG today. PE is attractive compared to Meta or Microsoft. A long-term steal.

author: Julia
content: People focus on AI and Cloud, but YouTube’s ad revenue is the real growth story. Underrated gem.

author: Delilah
content: AI competition is heating up, but Google has data no one else can touch. Gemini might surprise the skeptics.

author: Ryan
content: Bullish: Undervalued stock… all other mag7 too expensive

author: John
content: Bullish: I just put my money where my mouth is, I added 50 more shares of GOOG Good luck to all investors.

author: Jaspreet
content: Bullish: Lowest PE across Mag7. Serious no brainer here.

author: Jason
content: Bullish: Oversold , google Gemini will is the future
